title: Musical Instrument Proficiency
content:
Race, Class and level.

Musical Instrument Proficiency Information

You know how to play a variety of musical instruments and are able to entertain a crowd with them

How to unlock Musical Instrument Proficiency

Musical Instrument Proficiency can be acquired by:

Bard Lvl 1 any Character: help Alfira to finish her song by playing the second lute - passing two Performance checks (DC 15 and 10) any Character: have talent entertainer any Character: get the feat performer
